sentences.en: An elevator mechanic can work the machinery directly by turning this lever.
sentences.cn: 电梯修理工可以转动这根杠杆直接操作机器。

sentences.en: He examined the machine, worked a lever that lifted the lid.
sentences.cn: 他检查了机器，并使用杠杆打开盖子。

sentences.en: He is repairing the brake lever of an automobile.
sentences.cn: 他正在修理汽车的刹车杆.

sentences.en: He pushed a lever that speeded up the car.
I put the coin in the machine and pulled the lever.
sentences.cn: 我把硬币投入机器，拉动控制杆。

sentences.en: If you lever up the stone with a stick, you will find lots of insects living beneath it.
sentences.cn: 要是用棍把这块石头撬起来, 你就会看到那下面有许多虫子.

sentences.en: Insert the fork about 6in. from the root and simultaneously lever it backwards.
sentences.cn: 将耙子插入到离根部约6英寸的地方并同时向后扳。

sentences.en: Once you're stuck in deep snow, it's difficult to lever yourself out.
sentences.cn: 你一旦陷进深雪中, 那就很难出来.

sentences.en: Pity is a lever for quickening love.
sentences.cn: 怜悯是加速爱情的手段.

sentences.en: Press the lever until you hear the catch engage.
sentences.cn: 压下挡杆，直到听到挡挂好。

sentences.en: Pull the lever towards you to adjust the speed.
sentences.cn: 把操纵杆向你身体一侧拉动以调节速度。

sentences.en: Pull this lever to open the gate.
Push the gear lever into first.
Push the tiny lever on the lock.
Rich countries use foreign aid as a lever to achieve political aims.
sentences.cn: 富国利用对外援助作为达到政治目的的手段。

sentences.en: The device itself was right under the vehicle, almost in line with the gear lever.
sentences.cn: 该装置本身就在车子正下方，几乎与变速杆处于同一直线上。

sentences.en: They're trying to lever him out of his job as head of the firm.
sentences.cn: 他们试图把他从公司首脑的位置上给挤走.

sentences.en: We managed to prise off the lid with a tyre lever.
sentences.cn: 我们设法用卸外胎用的撬棍撬开了盖子.
